src.java.query

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.query.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    An object representation of a query. Stores a query id, a List of it's respective terms and Map of scores to store results for each document.
    Since:
    10-16-2017

        public void addScore(int docId,
                     int score)
        This function stores the results or scores that a query obtain for a certain document id.
        Parameters:
        docId - The id of the document.
        score - The score of a document for this query.

      • getScore
